original_text: Then Hilkiah answered and said to Shaphan the secretary, “I have found the Book of the Law in the house of the Lord.” And Hilkiah gave the book to Shaphan.
korean_text: 힐기야가 서기관 사반에게 말하여 이르되 내가 여호와의 전에서 율법책을 발견하였노라 하고 힐기야가 그 책을 사반에게 주매

sentences.original_text: and said to Shaphan the secretary
I have found the Book of the Law in the house of the Lord.
And Hilkiah gave the book to Shaphan.
